altername_name: Doraemon Wii: Secret Tool King Tournament
name: Doraemon Wii: Himitsu Douguou Ketteisen!
overview: Doraemon Wii: Secret Tool King Tournament known in Japan as Doraemon Wii - Himitsu Douguou Ketteisen is a video game based on the manga and anime series Doraemon. It was released in Japan on December 6, 2007 for the Nintendo Wii game console.
